scripts.android:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:open: npm run android:sync && npx cap open android
scripts.android:run: npm run android:sync && npx cap run android
scripts.android:build:debug: npm run android:sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.android:build:release: npm run android:sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.ios:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync ios
scripts.ios:open: npm run ios:sync && npx cap open ios
scripts.ios:run: npm run ios:sync && npx cap run ios
scripts.ios:build: npm run ios:sync && xcodebuild -workspace ios/App/App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Release -archivePath ios/App/build/App.xcarchive archive
